alert.note: Alert for Bear River Range (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 27 at 2:49AM MST until December 27 at 9:00PM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Expect moderate snow accumulations. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 9 inches below 7000 feet and 8 to 12 inches across mountains and passes above 7000 feet. Wind of 25 to 35 mph with gusts to near 50 mph will cause heavily drifting snow and reduced visibility in blowing snow. * WHERE...Idaho portion of the northern Wasatch Mountains, including Emigration Summit. * WHEN...Until 9 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel on State Highway 36 could be very difficult to impossible. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility and drifting snow can create temporary road closures.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
